com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database.testing

Class TestResourceClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database.testing.TestResourceClassLoader

  • public class TestResourceClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    A ClassLoader that looks for resources relative to the specified resources directory, or the current working directory, if none is specified.

    Note: This only overrides the one method used to locate DatabaseResourceBundles, so it is not a good candidate to stand on its own.

    Connector developers may want to use this to implement unit tests.

    Since:
    2.8
